long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Website Launcher - Open Your Favorite Websites with a Shortcut

Tired of opening the same websites every day? Quick Website Launcher is a Chrome extension that lets you open your favorite bookmarked websites instantly with a simple keyboard shortcut. Enhance your productivity by accessing your most-used sites with ease.

## Features:
- One-Click Access: Open multiple websites simultaneously with a single keyboard shortcut.
- Customizable Shortcuts: Set up your preferred keyboard combination to launch your selected websites.
- Bookmark Integration: Easily select your favorite websites from your existing Chrome bookmarks.
- Smart Activation: If your selected websites are already open, the extension will activate them instead of opening new tabs.
- Open in New Window: Choose to open websites in a new, maximized window for better visibility.
Automatic Tab Management: Avoid duplicate tabs with intelligent tab handling.

## How to Use:
- Install the Extension: Add Quick Website Launcher to your Chrome browser.
- Select Your Favorite Websites:
- Click on the extension icon to open the settings popup.
- From the list, select the bookmarked websites you want to open with the shortcut.

## To add a new website:
- Enter the website URL in the input field labeled "Enter website".
- Click the "Add" button to include it in your favorites list.

## Customize Settings:
- Open in New Window: Check the box if you prefer your websites to open in a new window.
- Save Preferences: Click the "Save" button to store your selections and settings.

## Set Up Keyboard Shortcut:
- By default, the shortcut key is Ctrl+Shift+Y (or Cmd+Shift+Y on Mac).
- To customize the shortcut: Go to chrome://extensions/shortcuts in your Chrome browser. Find Quick Website Launcher and set your preferred key combination.

## Launch Your Websites: 
Press your designated keyboard shortcut at any time to instantly open your selected websites.

## Why Use Quick Website Launcher?
- Save Time: No more typing URLs or clicking through bookmarks—launch all your essential websites at once.
- Boost Productivity: Quickly access sites you use frequently for work, study, or entertainment.
- Stay Organized: Manage your browser tabs efficiently without unnecessary clutter.
- Smart Recognition: The extension detects if your websites are already open and activates them instead of creating duplicates.

## Support and Feedback: We value your feedback and are here to help! If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us at weitianqiccc3@gmail.com.

## 摸鱼神器来啦！用 Quick Website Launcher，一键全屏切换你想看的网页，追剧、刷社交轻松自在！快捷键一按，工作摸鱼随时切换，再也不怕被抓包！
